mapper.sql: s_id, s_name, s_sex, s_passwd, s_class, s_major, s_college
mapper.update: update student set s_name = #{sName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, s_sex = #{sSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, s_passwd = #{sPasswd,jdbcType=CHAR}, s_class = #{sClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, s_major = #{sMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, s_college = #{sCollege,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where s_id = #{sId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
